original_text: There was a little city, and few men within it; and there came a great king against it, and besieged it, and built great bulwarks against it:
korean_text: 곧 작고 인구가 많지 아니한 어떤 성읍에 큰 왕이 와서 그것을 에워싸고 큰 흉벽을 쌓고 치고자 할 때에

sentences.original_text: and there came a great king against it
sentences.korean_translation: 위대한 왕이 그 성읍을 치러 와서

sentences.original_text: and built great bulwarks against it
